attributes.action: allow a referendum of ANY revamp of the EU Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that Ireland have rejected the current EU Treaty, it looks as though Brussels will not let this go and will revamp it in some way, whatever the outcome we MUST have a referendum and NOT an empty promise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
